snippet: In “Takes” the choreographer Nichole Canuso and the multimedia artist Lars Jan combine dance and cinema in a piece where the action occurs within a transparent cube.
abstract: Brian Seibert reviews performance of Takes, show that combines dance and video, performed by choreographer Nichole Canuso and multimedia artist Lars Jan at the 3LD Art & Technology Center.
lead_paragraph: In “Takes” the choreographer Nichole Canuso and the multimedia artist Lars Jan combine dance and cinema in a piece where the action occurs within a transparent cube.

headline.seo: Nichole Canuso Dance Company in ‘Takes’ - Review
headline.main: A Couple’s Intimate Rotations While Surrounded on All Sides
headline.print_headline: A Couple’s Intimate Rotations While Surrounded on All Sides
